headline.print_headline: ISIS Captives Say They Faced Blade as Rescue Came
headline.main: ISIS Captives Say They Faced Blade as Rescue Came

snippet: In interviews, four of the 69 Arab prisoners of the Islamic State freed in a military raid last week described life under the thumb of the Islamic State.
abstract: Captives rescued in American- and Kurd-led raid on Islamic State jail in Hawija, Iraq, describe torture and execution threats during imprisonment and draconian rules imposed by militants on daily life; many captives were imprisoned due to suspected involvement with American or Kurd forces.
lead_paragraph: In interviews, four of the 69 Arab prisoners of the Islamic State freed in a military raid last week described life under the thumb of the Islamic State.
